TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowInstance extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 表示工作流实例。

span.span: Represents a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 类可以公开用于控制执行工作流实例的方法和属性，它实质上是工作流运行时引擎所使用的实际工作流的代理。The class exposes methods and properties that can be used to control the execution of a workflow instance; it is essentially a proxy to the actual workflow instance used by the workflow runtime engine. 通过调用包含在 类中的适当方法，宿主或服务可以指示工作流运行时引擎在工作流实例上执行操作。A host or a service can instruct the workflow runtime engine to perform actions on a workflow instance by calling the appropriate methods that are contained in the class. 如果请求的操作无效，例如，如果宿主在一个已完成的工作流实例上调用 ，则工作流运行时引擎将引发相应的异常。If the requested action is not valid, for example, if the host calls on a workflow instance that has already completed, the workflow runtime engine will raise an appropriate exception. > [!NOTE] > 如果工作流实例由于宿主应用程序上的调用未返回而无法响应，则恢复此实例的唯一方法是重新启动运行时。If a workflow instance becomes unresponsive because a call on the host application does not return, the only way to recover the instance is to restart the runtime. 但是，如果实例被强行卸载、中止或挂起，则仍可以通过调用 方法继续此实例。However, if the instance has been forcibly unloaded, aborted, or suspended, it can be continued by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在工作流宿主中创建和启动 。The following code example demonstrates how you can create and start a in a workflow host. 此代码先创建 的实例，将服务添加至运行时，然后演示一个创建 对象的推荐方式。The code creates an instance of the , adds services to the runtime, and then demonstrates the recommended way to create a object. 该代码通过调用 方法并向该方法传递事先创建的类型来初始化 。The code initializes by calling the method and passing the previously created type to it. 使用 方法调用启动 。The is started with the method call. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“取消工作流”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[取消工作流](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb)。For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#260](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#260)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#260](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#260)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abort() cil managed

summary.span: 中止工作流实例。

span.span: Aborts the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流实例以同步方式中止，即方法在中止工作流实例之后返回。The workflow instance is aborted in a synchronous manner; that is, the method returns after the workflow instance has been aborted. 工作流运行时引擎将使内存中的工作流实例无效，并清除 。The workflow runtime engine invalidates the workflow instance in memory and clears the . 如果工作流实例使用了持久性服务，则在最后一个持久点之后执行的所有工作都将被丢弃。If a persistence service was used by your workflow instance, all work performed since the last persistence point is thrown away. 在中止工作流实例之后，工作流运行时引擎将引发 事件。After it aborts the workflow instance, the workflow runtime engine raises the event. 您可以调用 以便重新加载工作流实例，并从其最后的持久点启动。You can call to reload the workflow instance and start from its last persistence point. `Abort` 与 的不同之处在于，`Abort` 只是清除内存中的工作流实例，并可以从最后一个持久点重新启动；而 Terminate 则是清除内存中的工作流实例，并通知持久性服务此实例已从内存中清除。`Abort` is different from in that while `Abort` simply clears the in-memory workflow instance and can be restarted from the last persistence point, Terminate clears the in-memory workflow instance and informs the persistence service that the instance has been cleared from memory. 对于 ，这表示终止时该工作流实例的所有状态信息都已从数据库中删除。For the , this means that all state information for that workflow instance is deleted from the database upon termination. 您将无法从先前存储的持久点处重新加载工作流实例。You will not be able to reload the workflow instance from a previously stored persistence point. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在类型为 Workflow1 的工作流实例上调用“Abort”。The following example demonstrates calling Abort on a workflow instance of type Workflow1. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#13)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#13)]

exception.span: 工作流运行时引擎未运行。

span.span: The workflow runtime engine is not running.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ApplyWorkflowChanges(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges workflowChanges) cil managed

param.name: workflowChanges
param.span: 一个 ，为工作流实例指定动态更新。

span.span: A specifying dynamic updates for the workflow instance.

summary.span: 将更改应用到 对象所指定的工作流实例。

span.span: Applies changes to the workflow instance specified by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作流实例尚未挂起，则工作流运行时引擎将在应用更改之前暂时挂起实例。If the workflow instance is not already suspended, the workflow runtime engine temporarily suspends the instance before applying the changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对 对象调用 ApplyWorkflowChanges。The following example demonstrates calling ApplyWorkflowChanges to a object. 此代码示例摘自 Mainform.cs 文件中“自定义持久性服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample, from the Mainform.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[排序状态机示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c)。For more information, see the [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#89](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#89)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#89](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#89)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void EnqueueItem (IComparable queueName, object item, System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork pendingWork, object workItem);
.method public hidebysig instance void EnqueueItem(class System.IComparable queueName, object item, class System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork pendingWork, object workItem) cil managed
Public Sub EnqueueItem (queueName As IComparable, item As Object, pendingWork As IPendingWork, workItem As Object)
public: void EnqueueItem(IComparable ^ queueName, System::Object ^ item, System::Workflow::Runtime::IPendingWork ^ pendingWork, System::Object ^ workItem);

span.span: The name of the .
The object to enqueue.

param.name: pendingWork
param.span: 允许在传递 item 时通知发送方的 。

span.span: An that allows the sender to be notified when item is delivered.

param.name: workItem
param.span: 要传递给 方法的对象。

span.span: An object to be passed to the methods.

summary.span: 将消息同步发送到指定工作流队列。

span.span: Posts a message to the specified workflow queue synchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `item` 发送到指定的 。Sends the `item` to the specified . 若要在传递消息之后获得通知，您可以在您的服务中实现 ，并将一个 `workItem` 和一个 对象传送至 。If you want to be notified when the message is delivered, you can implement in your service and pass a `workItem` and an object to . 如果不想要此类通知，则可以为 `Nothing` 和 `pendingWork` 传送空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `workItem`）。If you do not want such notification, you can pass a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for `pendingWork` and `workItem`. 在将此方法和状态机工作流一起使用时，您可能会收到异常，并收到消息“未启用队列‘{0}’”。When using this method with a state machine workflow, you might get an exception with the message "Queue '{0}' is not enabled." 当状态机的当前状态不知道如何处理特定事件时，则会发生此异常。This happens when the current state of the state machine does not know how to handle a specific event. 例如，当前状态以外的其他状态包含 ，而后者包含由队列“{0}”表示的 时。For example, when some state other than the current state contains the that contains the that is represented by the queue '{0}'. > [!NOTE] > 不保证工作流实例按消息发送的顺序接收消息。Messages are not guaranteed to be received by the workflow instance in the order that they were sent. 例如，如果在现有队列（队列 A）中接收消息会导致工作流创建另一个队列（队列 B），该队列随后会侦听在发送第一条消息之后发送的另一条消息，那么，有可能第二条消息会先到达，但由于尚未创建其队列而无法接收。For example, if receiving a message in an existing queue (Queue A) causes a workflow to create another queue (Queue B), which then listens for another message sent after the first message, it is possible that the second message will arrive first, and will not be received due to its queue not being created yet. 为了避免此问题，在发送第二条消息之前，必须先验证第二个队列是否存在（使用 ）。To prevent this issue, the second message should not be sent until the presence of the second queue is verified (using .) ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 。The following code example demonstrates how to use . 当 事件发生时，调用本示例中定义的 `OnWorkflowIdled` 方法。When the event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called. 该方法使用 属性来确定哪个工作流处于空闲状态，然后通过调用 方法来获取该工作流实例的排队项的集合。It determines which workflow is idled using the property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the method. 该代码会循环访问该集合以确定哪个活动正在等待使工作流处于空闲状态的事件。The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow. 然后，该代码将使用 方法以及事件队列项的名称向工作流队列发出一个异常。It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the method along with the name of the event queue item. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“取消工作流”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[取消工作流](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb)。For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#261)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#261)]

The object to enqueue.

summary.span: 当工作流处于空闲状态时，将消息发送到指定的工作流队列。

span.span: Posts a message to the specified workflow queue when the workflow is idle.

summary.span: 在确认工作流计划程序处于空闲状态（即没有执行任何有效操作）之后， 将一直等待，直至工作流达到空闲点并编排队列。

span.span: waits until the workflow reaches an idle point and enqueues after verifying that the workflow scheduler is idle (that is, no active operation is being executed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等待工作流实例变为空闲状态，然后将 `item` 发送到指定的 。Waits for the workflow instance to become idle and then sends the `item` to the specified . 如果在工作流实例处于挂起状态时调用 ，工作流运行时引擎将引发 。If you call while the workflow instance is suspended, the workflow runtime engine will throw an . 若要在传递消息之后获得通知，您可以在您的服务中实现 ，并将一个 `workItem` 和一个 对象传送至 。If you want to be notified when the message is delivered, you can implement in your service and pass a `workItem` and an object to . 如果不想要此类通知，则可以为 `Nothing` 和 `pendingWork` 传送空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `workItem`）。If you do not want such notification, you can pass a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for `pendingWork` and `workItem`. 在将此方法和状态机工作流一起使用时，您可能会收到异常，并收到消息“未启用队列‘{0}’”。When you are using this method with a state machine workflow, you might get an exception that contains the message "Queue '{0}' is not enabled." 当状态机的当前状态不知道如何处理特定事件时，则会发生此异常。This occurs when the current state of the state machine does not know how to handle a specific event. 例如，当前状态以外的其他状态包含 ，而后者包含由队列“{0}”表示的 时。For example, when some state other than the current state contains the that contains the that is represented by the queue '{0}'. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `EnqueueItemOnIdle` 方法将信息发送到工作流实例。The following example demonstrates sending information to a workflow instance using the `EnqueueItemOnIdle` method. 首先，创建并启动 WorkflowInstance 对象；接着，创建一个实现 接口的对象。First, a WorkflowInstance object is created and started; next, an object that implements the interface is created. `EnqueueItemOnIdle` 然后调用中的队列名称、 排队项和要传递给 pendingWork 对象的方法的工作项的字符串值传递。`EnqueueItemOnIdle` is then called, passing in string values for the queue name, the enqueued item, and the work item to be passed to the methods of the pendingWork object. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity GetWorkflowDefinition() cil managed

summary.span: 检索此工作流实例的根活动。

span.span: Retrieves the root activity for this workflow instance.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用根活动来定位工作流的活动层次结构。You can use the root activity to navigate the activity hierarchy of the workflow. 此方法不是线程安全的，因此主机应将其调用与此方法同步。This method is not thread safe, so the host should synchronize its calls to this method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从工作流实例中检索工作流定义。The following example demonstrates retrieving the workflow definition from a workflow instance. 此代码示例摘自 Mainform.cs 文件中“自定义持久性服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample, from the Mainform.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[排序状态机示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c)。For more information, see the [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.DateTime GetWorkflowNextTimerExpiration() cil managed

summary.span: 返回下一个时间点，已计划在此时间点向此 传递计时器消息。

span.span: Returns the next point in time that this is scheduled to be delivered a timer message.

returns.span: DateTime 值表示下一个 时间，将在此时间向此 传递计时器消息。

span.span: A DateTime value that represents the next time this will be delivered a timer message.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来确定是否将其他工作流计时器消息编入队列。The following example demonstrates using the method to determine if more workflow timer messages are enqueued. 此示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的 WorkflowThreading SDK 示例。This example is from the WorkflowThreading SDK sample, from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流线程处理示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b650be7-09fa-47db-a2f6-523dc8ea5ee9)。For more information, see [Workflow Threading Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b650be7-09fa-47db-a2f6-523dc8ea5ee9). Public Function GetWorkflowQueueData () As ReadOnlyCollection(Of WorkflowQueueInfo)

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，该集合包含与此工作流实例关联的工作流队列的挂起项和订阅活动。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that contains the pending items and subscribed activities for the workflow queues associated with this workflow instance.
A of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将返回 对象的集合，每个集合都包含与此工作流实例关联的其中一个工作流队列状态的有关信息。 returns a collection of objects, each of which contains information about the state of one of the workflow queues associated with this workflow instance. 包含 的挂起项， 包含一个活动列表，需要订阅这些活动以便在 上发送项。 contains the pending items for a and contains a list of the activities that are subscribed for item delivery on a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法获取有关与 对象关联的所有工作流队列状态的信息。The following code example demonstrates how you can use the method to obtain information about the state of all workflow queues associated with a object. 当 事件发生时，调用本示例中定义的 `OnWorkflowIdled` 方法。When the event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called. 该方法使用 属性来确定哪个工作流处于空闲状态，然后通过调用 方法来获取该工作流实例的排队项的集合。It determines which workflow is idled using the property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the method. 该代码会循环访问该集合以确定哪个活动正在等待使工作流处于空闲状态的事件。The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow. 然后，该代码将使用 方法以及事件队列项的名称向工作流队列发出一个异常。It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the method along with the name of the event queue item. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“取消工作流”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[取消工作流](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb)。For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceId As Guid
public: property Guid InstanceId { Guid get(); };

summary.span: 获取工作流实例的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier for the workflow instance.
The of the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 来引用工作流实例。You can use to reference the workflow instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性获取有关 对象的信息。The following code example demonstrates how you can use the property to obtain information about a object. 第一个代码段创建名为 的 `instanceId` 变量。The first code snippet creates a variable named `instanceId`. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#210](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets19.cs#210)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#210](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets19.vb#210)] 当调用 方法时，第二个代码段使用 `OrderEventArgs` 属性作为 `CallBackForApproval` 构造函数调用中的第一个对象。The second snippet uses the property as the first object in an `OrderEventArgs` constructor call when the `CallBackForApproval` method is called. 此代码示例摘自 OrderServiceImple.cs 文件中“自定义持久性服务”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Listen SDK Sample from the OrderServiceImple.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[侦听示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f)。For more information, see [Listen Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#211](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets19.cs#211)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#211](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets19.vb#211)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load() cil managed

summary.span: 加载先前卸载的工作流实例。

span.span: Loads a previously unloaded workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是同步的，如果工作流实例可以加载，则 将在工作流实例被加载到内存并由工作流运行时引擎计划后返回。 is synchronous; if the workflow instance can be loaded, will return after the workflow instance has been loaded into memory and scheduled by the workflow runtime engine. 运行时将在持久性服务恢复内存中的工作流之后与工作流运行时引擎计划实例之前引发 事件。The runtime raises the event after the persistence service has restored the workflow instance in memory, but before the workflow runtime engine schedules the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何加载先前卸载的 对象。The following example demonstrates how to load a previously unloaded object. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#10)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReloadTrackingProfiles() cil managed

summary.span: 重新加载此工作流实例的跟踪配置文件。

span.span: Reload the tracking profiles for this workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行时跟踪基础结构将为与其跟踪通道关联的工作流实例重新加载各个 。The runtime tracking infrastructure will reload each for this workflow instance associated with its tracking channels. 如果它还没有处于挂起状态，则运行时跟踪基础结构将暂时挂起工作流，同时重新加载跟踪配置文件。If it is not already in a suspended state, the workflow is temporarily suspended by the runtime tracking infrastructure while the tracking profiles are reloaded.

exception.span: 工作流运行时引擎未运行。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Resume() cil managed

summary.span: 继续执行先前挂起的工作流实例。

span.span: Resumes execution of a previously suspended workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宿主可以调用 以继续执行先前挂起的工作流实例。The host can call to resume execution of a workflow instance that has been previously suspended. 如果工作流实例不处于挂起状态，则不执行任何操作。If the workflow instance is not in the suspended state, no action is taken. 运行时恰好在继续执行工作流实例之前引发 事件。The runtime raises the event just before execution of the workflow instance is resumed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在先前挂起的工作流实例上调用“Resume”。The following example demonstrates calling Resume on a previously suspended workflow instance. 此示例摘自“挂起和终止”SDK 示例。This example is from the Suspend and Terminate SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅[挂起和终止示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f4dffa58-d01e-44fb-b5a1-3b283d2c4517)。For more information, see [Suspend and Terminate Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f4dffa58-d01e-44fb-b5a1-3b283d2c4517). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#172](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets11.cs#172)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#172](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets11.vb#172)]

exception.span: 工作流运行时引擎未运行。

span.span: The workflow runtime engine is not running.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 开始执行工作流实例。

span.span: Starts the execution of the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将对此工作流实例的根活动调用 。 calls on the root activity of this workflow instance. 如果 遇到异常，则它将通过调用 ，并使用异常的 属性（作为终止原因传递）来终止此工作流实例。If encounters an exception, it terminates the workflow instance by calling with the property of the exception passed as the reason for the termination. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法在工作流宿主中启动 。The following code example demonstrates how you can use the method to start a in a workflow host. 此代码先创建 的实例，将服务添加至运行时，然后演示一个创建 对象的推荐方式。The code creates an instance of the , adds services to the runtime, and then demonstrates the recommended way to create a object. 它将创建一个 对象，然后将其强制转换为一个与其宿主关联的工作流对象。It creates a object and casts it to one of the workflow objects with which the host is associated. 代码接着通过调用 方法并传递给其先前创建的类型来初始化 。The code next initializes by calling the method and passing the previously created type to it. 使用 方法调用启动 。The is started with the method call. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“取消工作流”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[取消工作流](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb)。For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#260](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#260)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#260](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#260)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Suspend(string error) cil managed

param.name: error
param.span: 挂起工作流实例原因的说明。

span.span: A description of the reason for suspending the workflow instance.

summary.span: 挂起工作流实例。

span.span: Suspends the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此工作流实例是以同步方式挂起的。The workflow instance is suspended in a synchronous manner. 如果工作流实例已经挂起，则不执行任何操作；否则，工作流运行时引擎将挂起工作流实例，引发 事件，并在 `reason` 中传递 。If the workflow instance is already suspended, no action is taken; otherwise, the workflow runtime engine suspends the workflow instance, raises the event and passes `reason` in a . > [!NOTE] > 不会卸载此工作流实例。 does not unload the workflow instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 对象上调用“Suspend”。The following code example demonstrates calling Suspend on a object. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Terminate(string error) cil managed

param.name: error
param.span: 终止工作流实例原因的说明。

span.span: A description of the reason for terminating the workflow instance.

summary.span: 以同步方式终止工作流实例。

span.span: Terminates the workflow instance in a synchronous manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此工作流实例是以同步方式终止的。The workflow instance is terminated in a synchronous manner. 宿主调用 终止工作流实例。The host calls to terminate the workflow instance. 工作流运行时引擎将清除内存中的工作流实例，并通知持久性服务实例已经从内存中清除。The workflow runtime engine clears the in-memory workflow instance and informs the persistence service that the instance has been cleared from memory. 对于 ，这表示终止时该工作流实例的所有状态信息都已从数据库中删除。For the , this means that all state information for that workflow instance is deleted from the database upon termination. 您将无法从先前存储的持久点处重新加载工作流实例。You will not be able to reload the workflow instance from a previously stored persistence point. 在清除内存中的工作流实例并通知持久性服务终止之后，`Terminate` 方法将引发 事件，并在 `reason`包含的 T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException 的 属性中传递 。After the in-memory workflow instance is cleared and the persistence service is informed of the termination, the `Terminate` method raises the event and passes `reason` in the property of a contained in the . `Terminate` 与 的不同之处在于，Terminate 将清除内存中的工作流实例，并通知持久性服务已发生终止；而 `Abort` 只是清除内存中的工作流实例，然后您可以从最后一个持久点重新启动该实例。`Terminate` is different from in that while Terminate clears the in-memory workflow instance and informs the persistence service of the termination, `Abort` simply clears the in-memory workflow instance, which can then be restarted from the last persistence point. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 对象上调用“Terminate”。The following code example demonstrates calling Terminate on a object. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#8)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#8)]

exception.span: 工作流运行时引擎未运行。

span.span: The workflow runtime engine is not running.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryUnload() cil managed

summary.span: 当实例处于挂起或空闲状态时，将工作流实例从内存卸载到持久性存储区。

span.span: Unloads the workflow instance from memory to the persistence store when the instance is suspended or idle.

returns.span: 如果已卸载工作流实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the workflow instance was unloaded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作流实例处于“空闲”或“挂起”状态，则 将使用持久性服务从内存中移除此工作流实例，并将其保留到数据存储区。If the workflow instance is idle or suspended, uses the persistence service to remove the workflow instance from memory and persist it to a data store. 如果不存在使用 注册的持久性服务，则 将引发 。If there is no persistence service registered with the , throws an . 如果工作流实例成功保留，则运行时将引发 事件，并返回 `true`。If the workflow instance is successfully persisted, the runtime raises the event, and returns `true`. 如果工作流实例已卸载、已中止或已完成，则 将返回 `false`。 returns `false` if the workflow instance has already been unloaded, has been terminated, has been aborted, or has already completed. 宿主可以使用 回收空闲工作流的系统资源。The host can use to reclaim system resources from an idle workflow. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 事件激发时使用 TryUnload 方法卸载工作流。The following example demonstrates using the TryUnload method to unload a workflow when the event fires. 此示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“使用持久性服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Using Persistence Services SDK sample, from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用持久性服务示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3176b7e7-ae49-4d5c-802b-85032d6ebde6)。For more information, see [Using Persistence Services Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3176b7e7-ae49-4d5c-802b-85032d6ebde6). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#280](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#280)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#280](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#280)]

exception.span: 不存在已注册到工作流运行时引擎的持久性服务。

span.span: There is no persistence service registered with the workflow runtime engine.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Unload() cil managed

summary.span: 将工作流实例从内存卸载到持久性存储区。

span.span: Unloads the workflow instance from memory to the persistence store.

summary.span: 此调用将进行阻止，直至当前计划的工作完成或事务范围结束。

span.span: This call blocks until after the currently scheduled work is finished, or the end of a transaction scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是同步的，也就是说，它将在完成其执行的任何操作之后返回。 is synchronous; that is, it returns after completing any action that it performs. 如果工作流实例不处于空闲状态，则运行时将一直等待，直至可以中断实例。If the workflow instance is not idle, the runtime waits until the instance can be interrupted. 只有当前计划的工作项完成之后，才可以中断实例，这种情况通常发生在当前运行的活动从其 方法返回时。An instance can only be interrupted after the currently scheduled work item completes; this is typically when the currently running Activity returns from its method. 但是，如果实例正在执行 ，则事务范围必须在可将实例中断之前完成执行。However, if the instance is executing a , the transaction scope must complete execution before the instance can be interrupted. 然后，“Unload”将使用持久性服务从内存中移除工作流实例，并将其保留在数据存储区。Unload then uses the persistence service to remove the workflow instance from memory and persists it to a data store. 如果不存在使用 注册的持久性服务，则 将引发 。If there is no persistence service registered with the , throws an . 如果工作流实例成功保留，则运行时将引发 事件。If the workflow instance is successfully persisted, the runtime raises the event. 宿主可以使用 回收空闲工作流的系统资源。The host can use to reclaim system resources from an idle workflow. ## Examples 下面的示例演示对 对象调用 。The following example demonstrates calling on a object. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#11)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#11)]

exception.span: 不存在已注册到工作流运行时引擎的持久性服务。

span.span: There is no persistence service registered with the workflow runtime engine.
